item.title: Adding ingame highscores
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

So, I need some help adding in game highscores.

I have this in client.java:

if (command.startsWith("highscores")) { highscores(); }

public void highscores() { sendQuest("@blu@Highscores", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("1.", 8147); sendQuest("2.", 8148); sendQuest("3.", 8149); sendQuest("4.", 8150); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

How would i get it to save xp? and add it and stuff.

Please help!

I’m using 317 Deathzscape

Read full topic
